creator: TM Investment Technologies Private Limited
descriptionHtml:
🧐 Looking for a simple way to invest in stocks? Try the Teji Mandi app.

With over 5000+ stocks listed on the BSE, Stock market investing can be complicated. Investors are bombarded by stock tips, news & bits and pieces of advice.

Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing for you.

Teji Mandi helps you build a strong portfolio of high-quality stocks. Our team, backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services, brings decades of investing experience in the palm of your hand. Through one-click buy, sell & rebalances, we help you invest easily in the stock market. Along with this, you will get easy-to-understand jargon-free information about our every move - buy or sell.

Invest through your own Demat account. Pick one from over 10 brokers: Zerodha, 5paisa, Upstox, Angel Broking, Axis Direct, Edelweiss, HDFC Securities, IIFL, Trustline & Alice Blue.

Can’t find your broker? We will show you the portfolio & the stocks you need to buy through your broker

Don’t have a broker account yet? Open a demat account on the Teji Mandi app.

How does Teji Mandi help me?

Teji Mandi is a SEBI-registered Investment advisor that provides an easy, simple and jargon-free approach to investing. If you are
1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where to start
2) An avid investor but do not have time to track the markets
3) Lost money by picking wrong stocks
4) Frustrated with complicated stock analysis and trading apps
5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, Fixed deposit or Mutual Fund

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. We tell you what stocks to buy and when to sell. We explain everything along the way making our subscribers more-informed and better investors than 90% of the investors out there. With consistent index beating returns & high-quality advisory, Teji Mandi Flagship portfolio has a focused stock picking & disciplined re-balancing strategy.

Backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services, we bring you decades of stock-picking experience inside an easy-to-use app.

Get one powerful strategy
Combines tactical bets and long-term winners to generate best in class returns

Rebalance your portfolio with ease
Exit losing stocks and double down on winners with our one-click rebalances

Get Jargon-Free Practical information
We explain our every move - buy or sell, in an easy to understand language.

How do we pick stocks?

The Teji Mandi portfolio contains extensively researched stocks from our research team. Our investment strategy is powerful.

1) Liquid stocks: We pick stocks from Nifty 200, so there is always enough liquidity available
2) Focused stock picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long term winners for optimum results
3) Disciplined rebalancing: we eliminate losers & double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection
4) Model portfolio: We maintain 1 portfolio to ensure standardised & uniform returns for all our clients

Why should I trust Teji Mandi with my money?

Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor. We work on a monthly fee-based model & do not believe in commissions or hidden charges. We count two industry veterans as its directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities. The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying winning stock ideas through various market cycles.
____
❓ HAVE QUESTIONS?
Contact us anytime. We are here to help. Email us at support@tejimandi.com
Important Disclosure: Information contained in the application (the “App”) should not be considered a solicitation to buy, an offer to sell, or a recommendation for any security in any jurisdiction.
Privacy Policy: www.tejimandi.com/privacy.html
Terms and Conditions: https://tejimandi.com/terms.html
descriptionShort: Stock investing simplified. Invest in top companies. Build a strong portfolio.

🧐 Looking for a simple way to invest in stocks? Try the Teji Mandi app.

With over 5000+ stocks listed on the BSE, Stock market investing can be complicated. Investors are bombarded by stock tips, news & bits and pieces of advice.

Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing for you.

Teji Mandi helps you build a strong portfolio of high-quality stocks. Our team, backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services, brings decades of investing experience in the palm of your hand. Through one-click buy, sell & rebalances, we help you invest easily in the stock market. Along with this, you will get easy-to-understand jargon-free information about our every move - buy or sell.

Invest through your own Demat account. Pick one from over 10 brokers: Zerodha, 5paisa, Upstox, Angel Broking, Axis Direct, Edelweiss, HDFC Securities, IIFL, Trustline & Alice Blue.

Can’t find your broker? We will show you the portfolio & the stocks you need to buy through your broker

Don’t have a broker account yet? Open a demat account on the Teji Mandi app.

How does Teji Mandi help me?

Teji Mandi is a SEBI-registered Investment advisor that provides an easy, simple and jargon-free approach to investing. If you are
1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where to start
2) An avid investor but do not have time to track the markets
3) Lost money by picking wrong stocks
4) Frustrated with complicated stock analysis and trading apps
5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, Fixed deposit or Mutual Fund

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. We tell you what stocks to buy and when to sell. We explain everything along the way making our subscribers more-informed and better investors than 90% of the investors out there. With consistent index beating returns & high-quality advisory, Teji Mandi Flagship portfolio has a focused stock picking & disciplined re-balancing strategy.

Backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services, we bring you decades of stock-picking experience inside an easy-to-use app.

Get one powerful strategy
Combines tactical bets and long-term winners to generate best in class returns

Rebalance your portfolio with ease
Exit losing stocks and double down on winners with our one-click rebalances

Get Jargon-Free Practical information
We explain our every move - buy or sell, in an easy to understand language.

How do we pick stocks?

The Teji Mandi portfolio contains extensively researched stocks from our research team. Our investment strategy is powerful.

1) Liquid stocks: We pick stocks from Nifty 200, so there is always enough liquidity available
2) Focused stock picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long term winners for optimum results
3) Disciplined rebalancing: we eliminate losers & double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection
4) Model portfolio: We maintain 1 portfolio to ensure standardised & uniform returns for all our clients

Why should I trust Teji Mandi with my money?

Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor. We work on a monthly fee-based model & do not believe in commissions or hidden charges. We count two industry veterans as its directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities. The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying winning stock ideas through various market cycles.
____
❓ HAVE QUESTIONS?
Contact us anytime. We are here to help. Email us at support@tejimandi.com
Important Disclosure: Information contained in the application (the “App”) should not be considered a solicitation to buy, an offer to sell, or a recommendation for any security in any jurisdiction.
Privacy Policy: www.tejimandi.com/privacy.html
Terms and Conditions: https://tejimandi.com/terms.html
descriptionShort: Stock investing simplified. Invest in top companies. Build a strong portfolio.

Get one powerful strategy
Combines tactical bets and long-term winners to generate best in class returns

Rebalance your portfolio with ease
Exit losing stocks and double down on winners with our one-click rebalances

Get Jargon-Free Practical information
We explain our every move - buy or sell, in an easy to understand language.

How do we pick stocks?

The Teji Mandi portfolio contains extensively researched stocks from our research team. Our investment strategy is powerful.

1) Liquid stocks: We pick stocks from Nifty 200, so there is always enough liquidity available
2) Focused stock picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long term winners for optimum results
3) Disciplined rebalancing: we eliminate losers & double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection
4) Model portfolio: We maintain 1 portfolio to ensure standardised & uniform returns for all our clients

Why should I trust Teji Mandi with my money?

Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor. We work on a monthly fee-based model & do not believe in commissions or hidden charges. We count two industry veterans as its directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities. The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

Always wanted to invest in stocks but aren’t sure how to begin with? Looking for a simple way to invest in stocks? Try the Teji Mandi app now! Backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services, we bring you decades of stock-picking experience inside an easy-to-use app.

With over 5,000+ listed stocks; Stock market investing can be complicated. Investors are bombarded by stock tips, news, and bits and pieces of advice. If you aren't familiar with the mechanics of the stock market, the stock trading details spewing around can border on gibberish.

Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing for you.

Teji Mandi helps you build a strong portfolio of high-quality stocks. With just one-click buy, sell, and rebalance, we help you invest easily in the stock market. Along with this, you will get easy-to-understand jargon-free information about our every move – buy or sell.

Invest through your own Demat account. Don’t have a Demat account yet? Teji Mandi will help you open a Demat account.

Teji Mandi integrates with 10 brokers – Zerodha, 5paisa, Upstox, Angel Broking, Axis Direct, Edelweiss, HDFC Securities, IIFL, Trustline, and Alice Blue.

Can’t find your broker? No problem, we will give you access to the portfolio, and you can buy those stocks from your broker’s trading terminal.

How Does Teji Mandi Help You?
Download the Teji Mandi app now if you:

1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where and how to start.
2) An avid investor but does not have time to track the markets.
3) Lost money by picking the wrong stocks.
4) Frustrated with complicated stock analysis and trading apps.
5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, fixed deposit, or mutual fund.

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. Based on your risk appetite we help you with stock selection and allocation to build a long-term portfolio. We explain everything along the way, making our subscribers well-informed and better investors than most investors out there. For consistent index beating returns and high-quality advisory, Teji Mandi flagship portfolio has a focused stock picking and disciplined rebalancing strategy. Where we advise our subscribers to exit losing stocks and enter potential stocks.

Why Should You Trust Teji Mandi?

- Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor.
- We work on a flat fee-based model and do not believe in commissions or hidden charges.
- We count two industry veterans as the directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities.
- The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying potential winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

How Do We Pick Stocks?
Here’s how our research team picks the best stocks for you:
1) Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500, so there is always enough liquidity available.
2) Focused Stock Picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long-term winners for optimum results.
3) Disciplined Rebalancing: We eliminate losers and double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection.
4) Tailor Made Portfolio: Users get access to the portfolio based on their risk appetite.

Any Feedback?
We are constantly trying to improve our services, so your feedback is much appreciated! Email us at support@tejimandi.com

For Further Details, Visit: https://tejimandi.com/

Important Disclosure: Information contained in the application (the ‘App’) should not be considered a solicitation to buy, an offer to sell, or a recommendation for any security in any jurisdiction.

With over 5,000+ listed stocks; Stock market investing can be complicated. Investors are bombarded by stock tips, news, and bits and pieces of advice. If you aren't familiar with the mechanics of the stock market, the stock trading details spewing around can border on gibberish.

Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing for you.

Teji Mandi helps you build a strong portfolio of high-quality stocks. With just one-click buy, sell, and rebalance, we help you invest easily in the stock market. Along with this, you will get easy-to-understand jargon-free information about our every move – buy or sell.

Invest through your own Demat account. Don’t have a Demat account yet? Teji Mandi will help you open a Demat account.

Teji Mandi integrates with 10 brokers – Zerodha, 5paisa, Upstox, Angel Broking, Axis Direct, Edelweiss, HDFC Securities, IIFL, Trustline, and Alice Blue.

Can’t find your broker? No problem, we will give you access to the portfolio, and you can buy those stocks from your broker’s trading terminal.

How Does Teji Mandi Help You?
Download the Teji Mandi app now if you:

1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where and how to start.
2) An avid investor but does not have time to track the markets.
3) Lost money by picking the wrong stocks.
4) Frustrated with complicated stock analysis and trading apps.
5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, fixed deposit, or mutual fund.

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. Based on your risk appetite we help you with stock selection and allocation to build a long-term portfolio. We explain everything along the way, making our subscribers well-informed and better investors than most investors out there. For consistent index beating returns and high-quality advisory, Teji Mandi flagship portfolio has a focused stock picking and disciplined rebalancing strategy. Where we advise our subscribers to exit losing stocks and enter potential stocks.

Why Should You Trust Teji Mandi?

- Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor.
- We work on a flat fee-based model and do not believe in commissions or hidden charges.
- We count two industry veterans as the directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities.
- The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying potential winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

How Do We Pick Stocks?
Here’s how our research team picks the best stocks for you:
1) Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500, so there is always enough liquidity available.
2) Focused Stock Picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long-term winners for optimum results.
3) Disciplined Rebalancing: We eliminate losers and double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection.
4) Tailor Made Portfolio: Users get access to the portfolio based on their risk appetite.

Any Feedback?
We are constantly trying to improve our services, so your feedback is much appreciated! Email us at support@tejimandi.com

For Further Details, Visit: https://tejimandi.com/

Important Disclosure: Information contained in the application (the ‘App’) should not be considered a solicitation to buy, an offer to sell, or a recommendation for any security in any jurisdiction.

With over 5,000+ listed stocks; Stock market investing can be complicated. Investors are bombarded by stock tips, news, and bits and pieces of advice. If you aren't familiar with the mechanics of the stock market, the stock trading details spewing around can border on gibberish.

Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing for you.

Teji Mandi helps you build a strong portfolio of high-quality stocks. With just one-click buy, sell, and rebalance, we help you invest easily in the stock market. Along with this, you will get easy-to-understand jargon-free information about our every move – buy or sell.

Invest through your own Demat account. Don’t have a Demat account yet? Teji Mandi will help you open a Demat account.

Teji Mandi integrates with 10 brokers – Zerodha, 5paisa, Upstox, Angel Broking, Axis Direct, Edelweiss, HDFC Securities, IIFL, Trustline, and Alice Blue.

Can’t find your broker? No problem, we will give you access to the portfolio, and you can buy those stocks from your broker’s trading terminal.

How Does Teji Mandi Help You?
Download the Teji Mandi app now if you:

1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where and how to start.
2) An avid investor but does not have time to track the markets.
3) Lost money by picking the wrong stocks.
4) Frustrated with complicated stock analysis and trading apps.
5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, fixed deposit, or mutual fund.

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. Based on your risk appetite we help you with stock selection and allocation to build a long-term portfolio. We explain everything along the way, making our subscribers well-informed and better investors than most investors out there. For consistent index beating returns and high-quality advisory, Teji Mandi flagship portfolio has a focused stock picking and disciplined rebalancing strategy. Where we advise our subscribers to exit losing stocks and enter potential stocks.

Why Should You Trust Teji Mandi?

- Teji Mandi is a SEBI registered investment advisor.
- We work on a flat fee-based model and do not believe in commissions or hidden charges.
- We count two industry veterans as the directors, namely, Mr Raamdeo Agrawal, the Chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services, and Mr Ajay Menon, CEO at Motilal Oswal Securities.
- The investment team led by Vaibhav Agrawal and guided by its directors has a proven experience of identifying potential winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

How Do We Pick Stocks?
Here’s how our research team picks the best stocks for you:
1) Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500, so there is always enough liquidity available.
2) Focused Stock Picking: We combine a portfolio of tactical bets with long-term winners for optimum results.
3) Disciplined Rebalancing: We eliminate losers and double down on the winners to ensure meaningful capital protection.
4) Tailor Made Portfolio: Users get access to the portfolio based on their risk appetite.

Any Feedback?
We are constantly trying to improve our services, so your feedback is much appreciated! Email us at support@tejimandi.com

For Further Details, Visit: https://tejimandi.com/

Important Disclosure: Information contained in the application (the ‘App’) should not be considered a solicitation to buy, an offer to sell, or a recommendation for any security in any jurisdiction.

Terms and Conditions: https://www.tejimandi.com/legal/terms

Invest through your own Demat account. Don’t have a Demat account yet? Teji Mandi will help you open a Demat account.

How Does Teji Mandi Help You?
Download the Teji Mandi app now if you:

1) Want to invest in stocks but don’t know where and how to start.

5) Looking for a better return than a traditional savings account, fixed deposit, or mutual fund.

Teji Mandi is your one-stop solution for all your stock investing needs. Based on your risk appetite we help you with stock selection and allocation to build a long-term portfolio. creator: TM Investment Technologies Private Limited
descriptionHtml:
⚡ Investing in the stock market doesn't have to be as complicated as fine print. Teji Mandi cuts through the noise and simplifies stock market investing. Join our simplified investing platform, trusted by 10000+ subscribers. Diversify your portfolio with 15-20 quality stocks hand-picked from over 5000 listed companies.⚡

💡 Make Teji Mandi your personal investment advisor and get a seamless investment experience accessible right at your fingertips. Regardless of your level of stock investing experience, we’ll help you by suggesting which stocks to buy, why to buy them and the right time to sell them for a profit.💡

With SEBI-registered investment advisors - Teji Mandi, build a diversified all-weather stock portfolio for the long-term

💼 Invest
Got your own demat account? Integrate your existing demat account effortlessly with Teji Mandi App. New to the stock market? We’ll help you set up a new demat account within minutes

🧺 Diverse Stocks
Create a stock portfolio based on your financial goals and risk profile.

👤 Stock Advisors
Don’t know where to start? Skip the guesswork and invest with confidence in professionally built stock portfolios.

📈 Track
Check your portfolio performance through a simple dashboard, with just a click.

💌 Language
Prefer Hindi over English? Set your preferred language for investment communications.

📋 Strategies
Get tactfully prepared and research-based strategies to increase your portfolio’s performance.

🏄 Simplified Buying & Selling
Buy and sell multiple stocks in just one click.

☝ One-click Rebalance
Update your portfolio through one-click rebalance updates
💸 Pocket-friendly
Invest in small quantities in a disciplined manner through SIP

📲 Learn-on-the-go
Get bite-sized nuggets of insights from the share market news, and learn stock investing and trading anywhere, anytime.

Here’s how we help you pick the best stocks:

1. Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500 so that you always have enough liquidity available.

2. Focused Stock Picking: We take tactful decisions on your behalf to add long-term winning stocks to your portfolio.

3. Disciplined Rebalancing: We help you double down on winning stocks to ensure you have enough capital protection.

4. Tailor-made Portfolio: We curate your portfolio based on your risk appetite.

Teji Mandi integrates with 13 brokers and growing:
1. Zerodha
2. 5paisa
3. Upstox
4. Angel Broking
5. Axis Direct
6. Edelweiss
7. HDFC Securities
8. IIFL
9. Trustline
10. Alice Blue
11. Groww
12. Kotak Securities
13. ICICI Direct

We are also listed on Smallcase – https://tejimandi.smallcase.com/

What sets us apart?
Teji Mandi is a SEBI-registered investment advisor - Reg no. INA000015303
No hidden charges or commissions. Just a low-cost flat subscription fee.
Backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services.
A team of seasoned financial experts to identify potential winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

Download the app for the simplest stock investing experience. For more information, head to our website: https://tejimandi.com/

*Disclaimer*

Got your own demat account? Integrate your existing demat account effortlessly with Teji Mandi App. New to the stock market? We’ll help you set up a new demat account within minutes

☝ One-click Rebalance

💸 Pocket-friendly
Invest in small quantities in a disciplined manner through SIP

📲 Learn-on-the-go
Get bite-sized nuggets of insights from the share market news, and learn stock investing and trading anywhere, anytime.

1. Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500 so that you always have enough liquidity available.

Join our simplified investing platform, trusted by 10000+ subscribers. Diversify your portfolio with 15-20 quality stocks hand-picked from over 5000 listed companies.⚡

💡 Make Teji Mandi your personal investment advisor and get a seamless investment experience accessible right at your fingertips. Regardless of your level of stock investing experience, we’ll help you by suggesting which stocks to buy, why to buy them and the right time to sell them for a profit.💡

With SEBI-registered research analyst and investment advisor, like Teji Mandi, build a diversified all-weather stock portfolio for the long-term

💼 Invest
Got your own demat account? Integrate your existing demat account effortlessly with Teji Mandi App. New to the stock market? We’ll help you set up a new demat account within minutes

🧺 Diverse Stocks
Create a stock portfolio based on your financial goals and risk profile.

👤 Stock Advisors
Don’t know where to start? Skip the guesswork and invest with confidence in professionally built stock portfolios.

📈 Track
Check your portfolio performance through a simple dashboard, with just a click.

💌 Language
Prefer Hindi over English? Set your preferred language for investment communications.

📋 Strategies
Get tactfully prepared and research-based strategies to increase your portfolio’s performance.

🏄 Simplified Buying & Selling
Buy and sell multiple stocks in just one click.

☝ One-click Rebalance
Update your portfolio through one-click rebalance updates
💸 Pocket-friendly
Invest in small quantities in a disciplined manner through SIP

📲 Learn-on-the-go
Get bite-sized nuggets of insights from the share market news, and learn stock investing and trading anywhere, anytime.

Here’s how we help you pick the best stocks:

1. Liquid Stocks: We pick stocks from the Nifty 500 so that you always have enough liquidity available.

2. Focused Stock Picking: We take tactful decisions on your behalf to add long-term winning stocks to your portfolio.

3. Disciplined Rebalancing: We help you double down on winning stocks to ensure you have enough capital protection.

4. Tailor-made Portfolio: We curate your portfolio based on your risk appetite.

Teji Mandi integrates with 13 brokers and growing:
1. Zerodha
2. 5paisa
3. Upstox
4. Angel Broking
5. Axis Direct
6. Edelweiss
7. HDFC Securities
8. IIFL
9. Trustline
10. Alice Blue
11. Groww
12. Kotak Securities
13. ICICI Direct
14. Dhan
15. Fundzbazar

We are also listed on Smallcase – https://tejimandi.smallcase.com/

What sets us apart?
Teji Mandi is a SEBI-registered investment advisor - Reg no. INA000015303
No hidden charges or commissions. Just a low-cost flat subscription fee.
Backed by Motilal Oswal Financial Services.
A team of seasoned financial experts to identify potential winning stock ideas through various market cycles.

Download the app for the simplest stock investing experience. For more information, head to our website: https://tejimandi.com/

*Disclaimer*
The information provided by TM Investment Pvt Ltd is for educational purposes. This information should not be construed as an offer or a solicitation of an offer, a recommendation to buy, sell or hold any security, or financial product in any jurisdiction.

Privacy Policy: https://tejimandi.com/privacy
Terms and Conditions: https://tejimandi.com/terms-and-condition
